name.ja: <ruby>水晶機巧<rt>クリストロン</rt></ruby>－ハリファイバー<ruby>Ｐ<rt>プリズム</rt></ruby>

text.en:
2+ monsters, including a Tuner
If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Tuner from your Extra Deck in Defense Position, with a Level less than or equal to the total original Levels of the monsters used as material. During your opponent's Main or Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish this card you control; Special Summon 3 "Crystron Tokens" (Machine/WATER/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0), but they cannot be Tributed. You can only use each effect of "Crystron Halqifibrax Prism" once per turn.
